destinations.title: Colombo → Sigiriya
destinations.subtitle: Cultural Capital
destinations.description: Sigiriya, the Lion Rock Fortress, is one of Sri Lanka's most iconic landmarks.

destinations.title: Colombo → Galle
destinations.subtitle: Historic Fort City
destinations.description: Galle is a historic city on Sri Lanka’s southwest coast, known for its colonial architecture.

destinations.title: Kandy → Ella
destinations.subtitle: Hill Country
destinations.description: Ella is a small town in Sri Lanka's hill country, famous for its stunning views and tea plantations.

destinations.title: Colombo → Nuwara Eliya
destinations.subtitle: Little England
destinations.description: Nuwara Eliya is a picturesque hill town surrounded by tea estates and cool weather.

destinations.title: Colombo → Anuradhapura
destinations.subtitle: Ancient Capital
destinations.description: Anuradhapura is a UNESCO World Heritage site known for its ancient stupas and ruins.

destinations.title: Colombo → Trincomalee
destinations.subtitle: Coastal Paradise
destinations.description: Trincomalee boasts pristine beaches and the famous Koneswaram Temple.

destinations.title: Colombo → Jaffna
destinations.subtitle: Northern Gem
destinations.description: Jaffna offers unique Tamil culture, beaches, and historic forts.

destinations.title: Kandy → Dambulla
destinations.subtitle: Golden Temple City
destinations.description: Dambulla is home to the famous cave temple complex with ancient murals.

destinations.title: Colombo → Mirissa
destinations.subtitle: Beach Haven
destinations.description: Mirissa is a popular beach destination known for whale watching and surfing.

destinations.title: Colombo → Arugam Bay
destinations.subtitle: Surfer’s Paradise
destinations.description: Arugam Bay is a top surfing spot on Sri Lanka’s east coast.
